Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Phormicin (Phormia defensin A, natural AMPs; insect defensin A,  Ptdefensin A; UCSS1a; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 3S=S)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against  Gram+ cells, M. luteus and B. megaterium, five strains of B. subtilis. Warning: only Gram+ bacteria were tested.Structure: For a description of the 3D structure, see Structure 1995; 3: 435-448.You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB.Updated 8/2008; 2/2014; 4/2014; 4/2020; 7/2021; 8/2024 GW.
Literature Information.Author: Lambert J, Keppi E, Dimarcq JL, Wicker C, Reichhart JM, Dunbar B, Lepage P, Van Dorsselaer A, Hoffmann J, Fothergill J, et al.1989
Literature Information.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1989 Jan;86(1):262-6
Literature Information.Title: Insect immunity: isolation from immune blood of the dipteran Phormia terranovae of two insect antibacterial peptides with sequence homology to rabbit lung macrophage bactericidal peptides.
